description: Replace static hardcoded colors in admin panel components with dynamic theme-aware colors from CSS variables
scope: Admin panel UI components (non-CRUD buttons, icons, info cards, ColorSelector)
excludes: CRUD operation buttons (Add, Update, Delete, Save)

steps.title: Update ColorSelector Component
steps.description: Replace hardcoded green-500, blue-500, orange-500 in ColorSelector with dynamic var(--pixel-primary), var(--pixel-secondary), var(--pixel-accent)
changes: Replace border-green-500, bg-green-500/10, text-green-400 with border-pixel-primary, bg-pixel-primary/10, text-pixel-primary
Replace border-blue-500, bg-blue-500/10, text-blue-400 with border-pixel-secondary, bg-pixel-secondary/10, text-pixel-secondary
Replace border-orange-500, bg-orange-500/10, text-orange-400 with border-pixel-accent, bg-pixel-accent/10, text-pixel-accent
steps.reasoning: ColorSelector shows theme preview but uses static colors instead of actual theme colors from database

steps.title: Update Theme Settings Page Icons
steps.description: Replace static icon colors in admin/settings/theme/page.tsx with dynamic theme colors
changes: IoColorPalette icon: text-green-400 → text-pixel-primary
IoShieldCheckmark icon: text-blue-400 → text-pixel-secondary
Active badge: bg-blue-500/20 text-blue-400 border-blue-500 → bg-pixel-secondary/20 text-pixel-secondary border-pixel-secondary
IoCheckmark icon: text-green-400 → text-pixel-primary
Info box: bg-blue-500/10 border-blue-500 text-blue-400 → bg-pixel-secondary/10 border-pixel-secondary text-pixel-secondary
steps.reasoning: Theme settings page should reflect current active theme colors in UI elements

steps.title: Update Users Page Statistics Icons
steps.description: Replace static colors in user statistics cards with dynamic theme colors
changes: Total Users card: text-green-400 → text-pixel-primary (icon + number)
Total Roles card: text-blue-400 → text-pixel-secondary (icon + number)
Super Admins card: text-green-400 → text-pixel-primary (icon + number)
Action buttons: Keep red for delete, change edit button text-blue-400 → text-pixel-secondary
steps.reasoning: Statistics cards should use theme colors for visual consistency

steps.title: Update Roadmap Status Selector Colors
steps.description: Make roadmap status selector use theme colors
changes: Status selector statusColors object:
- completed: border-green-500 bg-green-500/10 text-green-400 → border-pixel-primary bg-pixel-primary/10 text-pixel-primary
- in-progress: border-blue-500 bg-blue-500/10 text-blue-400 → border-pixel-secondary bg-pixel-secondary/10 text-pixel-secondary
Quarter badge: text-green-400 → text-pixel-primary
Add Item button small text: text-green-400 hover:text-green-300 → text-pixel-primary hover:brightness-110
steps.reasoning: Roadmap status colors should follow active theme for consistency

steps.title: Update Input Focus Border Colors
steps.description: Change all input focus:border-green-500 to focus:border-pixel-primary across admin pages
changes: Find all inputs with focus:border-green-500
Replace with focus:border-pixel-primary
This affects: Question input, Answer textarea, Phase input, Quarter input, Title input, etc.
steps.reasoning: Input focus states should use primary theme color for consistent interaction feedback

steps.title: Add Dynamic Color Utility Classes
steps.description: Add Tailwind config for dynamic theme color utilities if needed
changes: Verify border-pixel-primary, border-pixel-secondary, border-pixel-accent are defined
Verify bg-pixel-primary/10, bg-pixel-secondary/10, bg-pixel-accent/10 work correctly
Add any missing utility classes for dynamic colors
steps.reasoning: Ensure all color utilities are properly configured in Tailwind

steps.title: Test Color Changes Across All Themes
steps.description: Verify all updated components render correctly with each theme preset
testCases: Switch to Default theme → Check ColorSelector, icons, inputs
Switch to Cyberpunk theme → Verify pink/purple colors appear
Switch to Ocean theme → Verify blue/cyan colors appear
Switch to Sunset theme → Verify orange/red colors appear
Test input focus states in all themes
Test roadmap status selector in all themes
Test user statistics cards in all themes
steps.reasoning: Ensure dynamic colors work correctly across all theme presets

cssVariables: --pixel-primary: Theme primary color (e.g., green, pink, blue)
--pixel-secondary: Theme secondary color (e.g., blue, purple, cyan)
--pixel-accent: Theme accent color (e.g., orange, red, yellow)

excluded.crudButtons: Green/Red buttons for Add/Save/Update/Delete remain static for clarity
excluded.textContent: Gray text colors in cards remain for readability
excluded.dangerActions: Red delete/danger buttons remain red for safety

successCriteria: ColorSelector buttons show actual theme colors (not static green/blue/orange)
Theme settings page icons use current theme colors
User statistics cards use theme colors for icons and numbers
Input focus borders use primary theme color
Roadmap status selector uses theme colors
All changes work correctly when switching between themes
No visual regressions in admin panel
